feed.title: Comments on Defining “Participatory Ecosystem” — Grow the Pie, Not Slice It!
feed.subtitle: As part of being a member of the sustainable MBA community at Pinchot University, I have been trying to articulate what I like about the kinds of collaboration that are possible even inside a competitive industry…[post continues with my personal history of a definition for a participatory ecosystem]
